forecast.name: Tonight

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 29. West wind 5 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening drapes Boston in a cloak of partial clouds, the chill in the air hints at the serenity of a winter night drawing closer. With temperatures settling around 15 degrees, the gentle westerly breeze adds a whisper of briskness, while the soft glow of city lights twinkles against the darkening sky. It is a moment suited for quiet introspection, perhaps best enjoyed indoors, wrapped in warm layers of soft wool or a well-fitted coat, a steaming mug cradled in your hands.

As dawn breaks tomorrow, the horizon will unfurl into a panorama of brilliant sunshine, promising a high near 29 degrees. This will be a day of clarity and warmth, inviting Bostonian hearts to venture outside into the glowing embrace of winter light. A light layer will suffice, perhaps a sweater under a jacket, perfect for a brisk stroll along the vibrant streets or a moment spent in one of the city's charming parks, where the sunlight dances across the branches of frost-tipped trees. Embrace the simple pleasures of the season; after all, the outdoor cafés will soon be alive with the laughter of friends, and the sculpted paths through the city will beckon with the promise of exploration.
